headline: Stifel Hires $1.3 Billion Advisor Team From Raymond James
summary: Stifel  Financial recruited a former  Raymond James Financial  financial advisor team that oversaw $1.35 billion in client assets.  The Greer Financial Group joined Stifel in a new office in Macon, Ga. The advisors on the team are Hal Greer, Hal’s brother George, Hal’s daughter Maggie, Sheri Haugabrook, and Ryan Emory.  Hal Greer said they joined Stifel because its resources were the best fit for his team’s practice and clients.

headline: Top ISA fund picks ahead of the new tax year
summary: As the tax year ends, experts say it could be worth reviewing the investments in your individual savings account, to make the most of your annual allowance.
